message.content: cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE. The paper proposes a novel approach to answer sentence selection using distributed representations and semantic encoding, which are common techniques in natural language processing and machine learning. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CL (Computation and Language), which focuses on the intersection of computer science and linguistics. The paper also deals with information retrieval (IR) and machine learning (LG, AI, NE), which are relevant sub-categories.
